statements: DELETE FROM BiodiversityData WHERE species_id = 10 AND conservation_status = 'Endangered';
DELETE FROM Species WHERE species_name = 'Tiger' AND population_size > 1000;

DELETE FROM observations WHERE observation_date < '2022-01-01' AND observer_name = 'John Smith';
